messages.content: If you're like me, you think some of our MPs are out of touch. We need MPs who listen a bit more, and shout a bit less. We need someone effective standing up for us in Camden.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Across Camden people say it's not the same Labour Party anymore. Under Tony Blair and Gordon Brown they had the majority. The Conservatives abandoned their traditional beliefs - people are saying that it's the Lib Dems who are now fighting for ordinary people.

issues.education: Issues like protecting health services, securing a decent education for our children, and for a fairer tax system that helps those on low and middle incomes.
issues.health: Issues like protecting health services, securing a decent education for our children, and for a fairer tax system that helps those on low and middle incomes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to use my experience to campaign for local people and our area. I live and work in Camden and will be a hard-working, energetic and local MP who will stand up for all of us, just like I have done as a local resident and campaigner.

contactInformation.address: 3a Murray Street, Kentish Town, London NW1 9RE

images.caption: Jo Shaw - A fresh start for Camden
